title: Calories in Cheez-Its
meta_description: Learn calories in Cheez-Its per serving, plus carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and nutrition tweaks for this cheesy snack.
assumptions: Original Cheez-Its crackers; standard serving of 27 crackers (30 g); no toppings or dips.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, and serving size; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One serving of Cheez-Its (27 crackers) provides 150 kcal and 3 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp cheddar dip per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of Cheez-Its?
faqs.a: About 150 kcal for 27 original Cheez-Its crackers.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Cheez-Its?
faqs.a: One serving has 18 g carbs, including 1 g fiber and 1 g sugars.
Yes, 230 mg sodium per serving (about 10% DV).

faqs.q: How much fat is in Cheez-Its?
faqs.a: 7 g total fat per serving, with 2 g saturated fat.
3 g protein per serving from the cheese and wheat base.
